title: Media Services Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space, allowing for new possibilities while staying connected to others.
description: This role involves collaborating with various teams and partners to design and automate media distribution workflows for VisionPro Immersive content. Responsibilities include creating diagrams, publishing specifications, testing server build profiles, monitoring service health, and supporting content delivery SLAs.
key_qualifications: 5+ years of media processing or pipeline automation experience, knowledge of video codecs, strong programming skills in Python, experience with cloud infrastructures, networking concepts, debugging, and troubleshooting, as well as analytical and problem-solving skills.
preferred_qualifications: Experience programming in C, C++, Objective-C, or Swift is a plus.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $166,600 and $250,600, along with opportunities for growth and development. Other benefits include stock programs, retirement benefits, medical and dental coverage, discounted products and services, tuition reimbursement, relocation assistance, and discretionary bonuses or commissions. For more information, visit the Apple Benefits page.
